message.content: {"MajorClaims":[{"ID":"MC1","Text":"We should attach more importance to cooperation during primary education."}],"Claims":[{"ID":"C1","Text":"Competition can effectively promote the development of economy."},{"ID":"C2","Text":"Competition makes the society more effective."},{"ID":"C3","Text":"A more cooperative attitude towards life is more profitable in one's success."}],"Premises":[{"ID":"P1","Text":"Through cooperation, children can learn about interpersonal skills which are significant in the future life of all students."},{"ID":"P2","Text":"What we acquired from teamwork is not only how to achieve the same goal with others but more importantly, how to get along with others."},{"ID":"P3","Text":"During the process of cooperation, children can learn about how to listen to opinions of others, how to communicate with others, how to think comprehensively, and even how to compromise with other team members when conflicts occurred."},{"ID":"P4","Text":"The greater our goal is, the more competition we need."},{"ID":"P5","Text":"Without cooperation, there would be no victory of competition."},{"ID":"P6","Text":"The success belongs to the whole team."}],"ArgumentativeRelations":[{"Origin":"C1","Relation":"for","Target":"MC1"},{"Origin":"C2","Relation":"against","Target":"MC1"},{"Origin":"C3","Relation":"for","Target":"MC1"},{"Origin":"P1","Relation":"supports","Target":"MC1"},{"Origin":"P2","Relation":"supports","Target":"P1"},{"Origin":"P3","Relation":"supports","Target":"P1"},{"Origin":"P4","Relation":"supports","Target":"C2"},{"Origin":"P5","Relation":"supports","Target":"C2"},{"Origin":"P6","Relation":"supports","Target":"P5"}]}
